text: pitin thiyala alewwanam wada hondayi maye hithe...

rajuge sirurehi ginigena dawennak men wu apahasuthawaya samanaya kirimata, ema rajyaye thibu ithamath shithalama jalaya sahitha badulle halgraman oyen jalaya dinapatha ragenawith ohuta panaya kirimata salaswiya.
maithi්rapala sirisena mathithuma janadhipathi dhurayata pathwimen anathuruwa iranaye sidukarana palamu rajya sancharaya meyayi.
mama hithuwe dawas ganinne eekatayi kiyala...
ehi jani janaya rahasinwath paw nokarathi.
me nisa da ranil mahindawa raki..
kokasas kandu - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya
mese marana danduwamata yatath kala ayage mala siruru bhumadanaya kirimata ida denne natha.

wathman aanduwa 2018 wasara sandaha yojana kara athi ayawaya sambandhayen samastha lanka gowijana sammelanaye mathaya idiripath kirima sandaha ada (14) dambaulledi kandawa thibu madhya hamuwa amathamin namal karunarathna mahatha me bawa pawasiya.

mitath wada khedajanaka siduwima nam eda ritigala jethawanaramaye bauddha rajadaruwan ha podu janathawa wisin wanda pudagath budu siripathul yugalaya samaga thawath pujaniya sthanawalin soyagath siripathul yugalayan kihipayakma ada wana wita ruwanwali saye salapathala maluwe gal atharata alla bima sawikara e්wa podu mahajanayata pagennata salaswimayi.
tika dawasakin me bel eka gahana manussayata prathiwadiyek pahala kada himiyan wisin yodawala thibba.
gon madhya, maithrige iwa ha ranil ge stratejiya...
athawarawalata lakwanne kanthawan pamanak bawa apa samajaye bahutharayakage mathayayi.
me karanu kiwe budu dahame uganwena marayath, kithunuwan wisin kiyana sathanuth, boho samanatha athi bawini.
guwan yanawala aarakshawata tharjanayak wiya haki bawin merata guwanthotupola aashritha kilomitar 5ka bhumi pradesha...
ithin obath mema mrudukanga bhawitha kara obage murapada kalamanakaranaya karaganne nam oba sitinneth awadhanam thathwayakayi.
in palamuwanna jayika hewath japana aayojana sahayogitha eejansiya wana athara aneka jebiayisi hewath jathyanthara sahayogithawa sandaha wu japan bankuwayi.
mahinda samanga athi pudgalika tharahawan obe sithen iwath kala wita me lipiye liya aththe "sathyayata pakshapathiwa" bawa obe andha manasata penenu atha.
kolambaa – hayid pitiye pawathwena eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye mewara mayi dina raliyata hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata da aaradhana kara thibenawa.
dan kiyanne wenasma kathawaki..!!
onna eeka ayinma karala udinma damma prekshaka illima nisama.
marthu 11 sikurada hawasa 2.46ta, methek kalekata japanaye athiwechcha darunuma bhumikampawa mehetath danuna.
niwese udawiyata hora maha ra niwesin pitathwa gos athi bawa kiyana tharuniyak eeta pasu dina niwesata pamina nana kamare redi kadakin gela walalagena miyagos sitiyadi soyagena thibini.
oyage kakula dan sampurnayenma hondayi.
"sha mata niyemeta mach wenawa " aya thawath hari hari baluwaya.
kohe hari kamak na digatama ehema hangila hitiya nam pin sidda wenawa.....
ohuth ewani kenek.
"oo" aksharayen aarambha wana suthra deshana ...
ekko, bombakaruge mawa miyagos thibini.
lankawe paladayi wada karana janathawage hisa matha kada wati thibena loku ma bara mema dawantha, akaryakshama rajayayi.
api nam kayi .
pasugiya kalaye nam ape amma awith hitiya.
bauddha dharmaya deshana karana bawa kiyamin mithya matha wapuranno merata gihi, pawidi deparshwaye oona tharam sitithi.
lokaye hondama adhyapana kramaya pawathinawa yayi salakenne finlanthaye.
(me sadaha obata hakiyawa athi oonama mudalakin masikawa dayaka wiya haki bawa karunikawa salakanna)

uu bohoma parissamata piliwelata wada karana eka.

math danagaththa mata nan oya dekenma awulak na kiyala.

namuth eks-marks yanu fewarits bakap karana mrudukangayakda wana nisa wasara gananawak thisse oba sew karana bukmark pariganakaya kriyawirahitha wima ho fomat kirima aadi katayuthu walin pasuwath apahasuwakin thorawa obata nawatha labaganimata hakiyi…
wenkatesan mese pawasi ya: “indiyawa thula rajaye karmantha athuluwa siyaluma karmanthawala labha sha්rama kontha්rath ka්ramaya digatama thiyenawa.
wijaya rajapaksha, jon amarathunga marana daduwama gana katha karannata patan aran thiyenne, ranilge upades anuwa wiya hakiya.
ehema data mage chu eka godak thetha wela thiyenawa.eka dawasak mama aasama deyak wuna.

wadi wu indhana milata sapekshawa, bas gasthu sanshodhana jathika prathipaththiyata anuwa labana sathiye sita aniwarya lesa bas gasthu ihala damana bawa samastha lanka paudgalika bas samagam sammelanaya pawasanawa.
apa sathi anthaya gatha karana ayuruda melesama purwa nigamanaya keri atha.

sayimanta kolambaata enta para kapune elesa ya.

pawan saha walaluwange maranin pasuwa koti sanwidhanaye pa්rabalayakuwu ram, nagulan saha paramananda mastar athulu kandayam kihipayak kumana kalawe kadawuru banda bawa aarakshaka anshawalata salawini. 2007 okthobar 15 wani dina sidu wu koti ka්riyakarakamak samagama okthombar 20 dinama okadata rajaye aarakshaka ansha paminiyeya.
eeniya aanthika chanda kottashawala da danena wenasak kirimata owunta no haki ya.
ee nisa witin wita kal dama thibu ee miyuru sangithamaya kathabaha yalith kotas kipayak magin eda sinamawe rasaliptha chithrapata githa osse arambaami.
indiyawe oya kiyana thruthiya adhyapana aayathana walin bihiwana wishala pirisak (50% wage), kisima wadakata nathiya kiya eyalagema wruththiya amathi kiyuwe wadi aathaka nowe.
danata awurudu thuna hatharakata kalin aya pemwathiyak wa siti kalaye labunu thagi goda athare thamayi me thagga thibi aththe.
eya pupura giya wita ahimi wana jiwitha wenuwen thawenne dawenne jiwath wannawunya.
namuth pitapathak nomathiwa patan ganna eewa thamayi prekshakayin atharaman karanne.
anith hama thanamath ehma wenna athi kiyala hithanawa.
samaya saha sanhindiyawa shakthimath kirimata naththal udawa itha wadagath awasthawak bawa janapathi pawasayi.

ee anuwa winishchaya dinayedi sama palakayekugenma owunge wagakim itukala akaraya gana prashna karanu labannoya.
wishwiya miniseku lesa nawatha ipadenna ooni.
ethula prajathanthrawadaya hariyakarawa kriyathmaka nowuwa wuwath prajathanthrawadaya pilibanda iwak me samajaya thula pathira pawathi.
nathnam balaganna thiwuna bassage upeksha paramithawa.
wadi wana witada thathwaya esemaya.

ese no dana sitima nisa guruthwakarshanaya ha wishesha sapekshathawadaya ekathu wimen sadharana sapekshathawadaya labena bawa ma no danne yayi amarathunga mahatha no pakilawa prakasha kale ya. 2011 wana thuru wishwawidyalayaye sadharana sapekshathawadaya iganwu ma no danna eheth pothapathin sapekshathawadaya igena athi amarathunga mahatha danna karunu igenaganime aashawak mata athi wiya.

yudagini dal nam awileyi malliyo mama katawahagena indala eekata dayaka una ekata mata hena gahanna oona biyond frem malliye mage ee mel adras eka obathuma ge mokak hari gajat ekakata ahuwenawa nam eeka makala danna – obathumata pin sidda weyi uda koment eke eka wachanayak makanna bari una pitastharaya 2 kiyapu kathawak mama methanata dala mage bokku kata waha gannawa “saba sinhala urumaya goda nagi aththe anekage le ha mas matha nowana bawa apata sahathika kala hakke ewitayi.api mahajathiya nam sulujathiya rakime wagakima apa sathuyi. 71 karalledi waradi kala rajaya perala damanna samaja wyapara katayuthu kala. 87-89 kalaye nithiwirodhi ghathana kala rajaya perala damanna mawwarungeperamuna mathuwuna.
